${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Research.NAME: Research
${modID}:Research.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: NL Gain !M! Strength or !M! Dexterity.

${modID}:OldDevelopment.NAME: Development
${modID}:OldDevelopment.DESCRIPTION: The first time each turn you play two cards of the same type, draw !M! card.
${modID}:OldDevelopment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first time each turn you play two cards of the same type, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:Development.NAME: Development
${modID}:Development.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - 1 Skill: Upgrade !M! random card in your draw pile.
${modID}:Development.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - 1 Skill: Upgrade !M! random cards in your draw pile.

${modID}:OpeningStatement.NAME: Opening Statement
${modID}:OpeningStatement.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. Next turn, add a *Burnt *Document into your hand.
${modID}:OpeningStatement.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. Next turn, add a *Burnt *Document into your hand.

${modID}:EnergySlash.NAME: Energy Slash
${modID}:EnergySlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this is the first card you played this turn, Exhaust.

${modID}:GravityParry.NAME: Gravity Parry
${modID}:GravityParry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL When ${modID}:Phasing, double these values.

${modID}:Olderpower.NAME: Overpower
${modID}:Olderpower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you played a Power card this turn, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:Assist.NAME: Assist
${modID}:Assist.DESCRIPTION: If the next card you play is an Attack, gain !B! Block and draw a card.

${modID}:IonSurge.NAME: Ion Surge
${modID}:IonSurge.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL Whenever you play a Power card, add ${modID}:Phase and Ethereal to a card at random.
${modID}:IonSurge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you play a Power card, add ${modID}:Phase and Ethereal to a card at random.

${modID}:O5Command.NAME: O5 Command
${modID}:O5Command.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add ${modID}:Phase and Ethereal to all cards in your hand, and !M! *Dazes onto the top of your draw pile.

${modID}:OwnTempo.NAME: Own Tempo
${modID}:OwnTempo.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Attacks, Skills, or Powers. NL All cards of that type in your hand cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:freeattacks.NAME: Attacks
${modID}:freeattacks.DESCRIPTION: All Attacks in your hand cost 0 this turn.

${modID}:freeskills.NAME: Skills
${modID}:freeskills.DESCRIPTION: All Skills in your hand cost 0 this turn.

${modID}:freepowers.NAME: Powers
${modID}:freepowers.DESCRIPTION: All Powers in your hand cost 0 this turn.

${modID}:Older.NAME: Folder
${modID}:Older.DESCRIPTION: If you've played !M! unique card types this turn, gain [E].

${modID}:OldDatamining.NAME: Datamining
${modID}:OldDatamining.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card for every unique card type you've played this turn.

${modID}:Uplink.NAME: Uplink
${modID}:Uplink.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the next card you play has ${modID}:Phase, Exhaust a copy of it.

${modID}:RSquare.NAME: R-Square
${modID}:RSquare.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increases by 1 for every ${modID}:Trial on your active ${modID}:Experiments.

${modID}:Adapt.NAME: Adapt
${modID}:Adapt.DESCRIPTION: If you have 3 or less cards in your hand, draw 2 cards. NL Otherwise, Exhaust a card in your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: If you have 3 or less cards in your hand, draw 2 cards.
Otherwise, Exhaust a card in your hand.

${modID}:Headstrong.NAME: Headstrong
${modID}:Headstrong.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have not played a Power this combat. NL Deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have played a Power this combat.

${modID}:RagingBlade.NAME: Raging Blade
${modID}:RagingBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Do !${modID}:Subdamage! damage to all other enemies. Add a *Burn to your hand.

${modID}:ShelvedProject.NAME: Shelved Project
${modID}:ShelvedProject.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - End Turn: Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

${modID}:OldCleanUpDuty.NAME: Clean-Up Duty
${modID}:OldCleanUpDuty.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Add a *Slimed to your hand.

${modID}:OldConcealedCarry.NAME: Concealed Carry
${modID}:OldConcealedCarry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak. NL Otherwise, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:ConcealedCarry.NAME: Concealed Carry
${modID}:ConcealedCarry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is Exhausted, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:ShuttleKick.NAME: Shuttle Kick
${modID}:ShuttleKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a *Short *Circuit into your draw pile.

${modID}:OldLaserStrike.NAME: Laser Strike
${modID}:OldLaserStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals !M! more damage for each Skill you played this turn.

${modID}:EncryptData.NAME: Encrypt Data
${modID}:EncryptData.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards in your hand. Gain a *Burnt *Document for each card Exhausted.

${modID}:ClipboardSlap.NAME: Clipboard Slap
${modID}:ClipboardSlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust the top card of your discard pile.

${modID}:Documentation.NAME: Documentation
${modID}:Documentation.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Power card, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:ServerHash.NAME: Server Hash
${modID}:ServerHash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${modID}:Blocc! Block. NL ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - 1 Attack: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Terminate: Draw a card.

${modID}:dummyattack.NAME: Dummy!
${modID}:dummyattack.DESCRIPTION: Does absolutely nothing! NL Classified as an attack.

${modID}:Overpower.NAME: Overpower
${modID}:Overpower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - 1 Power. ${modID}:Terminate: Draw !M! cards.

${modID}:Datamining.NAME: Datamining
${modID}:Datamining.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards at the start of your next turn.

${modID}:TrialRun.NAME: Trial Run
${modID}:TrialRun.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL If you have ${modID}:Phased a card this turn, gain [E].

${modID}:CleanUpDuty.NAME: Clean Up Duty
${modID}:CleanUpDuty.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. Add a *Slimed to the top of your deck.
${modID}:CleanUpDuty.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. Add a *Slimed to the top of your deck.

${modID}:Wingbeat.NAME: Wingbeat
${modID}:Wingbeat.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw 1 card for every card you Exhausted the previous turn.

${modID}:ShortCircuit.NAME: Short Circuit
${modID}:ShortCircuit.DESCRIPTION: Plays when drawn. NL ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - ${modID}:Completion: Lose [E]. ${modID}:Terminate: Exhaust.

${modID}:LaserStrike.NAME: Laser Strike
${modID}:LaserStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Increase this card's damage by !${modID}:Scaling! for each ${modID}:Termination this combat.

${modID}:Analyze.NAME: Analyze
${modID}:Analyze.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - 2 ${modID}:Completions: Permanently increase this card's damage by !M!. ${modID}:Terminate: Exhaust.

${modID}:PlasmicEnergy.NAME: Plasmic Energy
${modID}:PlasmicEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Gain [E] and draw a card next turn.

${modID}:CutThroughLight.NAME: Cut Through Light
${modID}:CutThroughLight.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage, then add ${modID}:Phase to this card.

${modID}:FerrousBlade.NAME: Ferrous Blade
${modID}:FerrousBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a Ferrous Blade that costs an additional [E] this turn.
${modID}:FerrousBlade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a Ferrous Blade+ that costs an additional [E] this turn.

${modID}:Overwrite.NAME: Overwrite
${modID}:Overwrite.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand to add ${modID}:Phase to. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:RemnantResearch.NAME: Remnant Research
${modID}:RemnantResearch.DESCRIPTION: Add 2 *Burnt *Documents to your hand. At the end of your turn, gain !B! Block for each card Exhausted this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Hypothesis.NAME: Hypothesis
${modID}:Hypothesis.DESCRIPTION: The first a card is Exhausted each turn, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:Organization.NAME: Organization
${modID}:Organization.DESCRIPTION: Choose an Active ${modID}:Experiment to gain "Draw 2 cards" and ${modID}:Terminate: Exhaust.
${modID}:Organization.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an Active ${modID}:Experiment to gain "Draw 2 cards."

${modID}:AppliedInformation.NAME: Applied Information
${modID}:AppliedInformation.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL On ${modID}:Termination, lower its cost by 1 this combat.

${modID}:Dematerialize.NAME: Dematerialize
${modID}:Dematerialize.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If there is a Status in your hand, gain [E] and draw a card.

${modID}:ResearchGrants.NAME: Research Grants
${modID}:ResearchGrants.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, reduce your ${modID}:Experiments' cost to 0.

${modID}:Entropy.NAME: Entropy
${modID}:Entropy.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add !M! random card into your hand. It gains Ethereal.
${modID}:Entropy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add !M! random card into your hand. It gains Ethereal and ${modID}:Phase.

${modID}:Enthalpy.NAME: Enthalpy
${modID}:Enthalpy.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand with ${modID}:Phase. NL At the start of your turn, add a copy of that card to your hand with Ethereal and no ${modID}:Phase.
${modID}:Enthalpy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand with ${modID}:Phase. NL At the start of your turn, add a copy of that card to your hand with Ethereal.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have no cards with Phase in my hand.

${modID}:ShieldCrash.NAME: Shield Crash
${modID}:ShieldCrash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. When this card is Exhausted, add a copy to your hand with swapped damage and Block values.

${modID}:DarkMatterLancet.NAME: Dark Matter Lancet
${modID}:DarkMatterLancet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! *Voids to your discard pile.

${modID}:PlasmaPulse.NAME: Plasma Pulse
${modID}:PlasmaPulse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - 1 Attack: Add a *Plasmic *Energy to your hand.

${modID}:Hyperfocus.NAME: Hyperfocus
${modID}:Hyperfocus.DESCRIPTION: Choose an Active ${modID}:Experiment. ${modID}:Terminate all other ${modID}:Experiments, then add their remaining ${modID}:Trials to that ${modID}:Experiment.

${modID}:ImpactSlash.NAME: Impact Slash
${modID}:ImpactSlash.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if every other card in your hand is a Status. NL Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Weak.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have non-Status cards in my hand.

${modID}:Exploit.NAME: Exploit
${modID}:Exploit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - Start 1 Turn: Apply !M! Vulnerable to a random enemy.
${modID}:Exploit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - Start 1 Turn: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

${modID}:SubspaceStrike.NAME: Subspace Strike
${modID}:SubspaceStrike.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage for each Status in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:WaveParticle.NAME: Wave Particle
${modID}:WaveParticle.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - Exhaust 1 Status: Add a *Subspace *Strike to your hand.

${modID}:OldSystemError.NAME: System Error
${modID}:OldSystemError.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - Draw 1 Status: Add a *Burnt *Document to your hand.
${modID}:OldSystemError.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Experiment !${modID}:Trial! - Draw 1 Status: Add a *Burnt *Document to your hand. ${modID}:Terminate: Upgrade all *Burnt *Documents in your hand.

${modID}:VolcanicResearch.NAME: Volcanic Research
${modID}:VolcanicResearch.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 3 *Magma *Burns into your draw pile. Whenever you draw a Status card, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:NeutralyzerSerum.NAME: Neutralyzer Serum
${modID}:NeutralyzerSerum.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Experiment X - 1 Attack: Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable to a random enemy.
${modID}:NeutralyzerSerum.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Experiment X+1 - 1 Attack: Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable to a random enemy.

${modID}:ParticleAccelerator.NAME: Particle Accelerator
${modID}:ParticleAccelerator.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Next turn, add ${modID}:Phase to all drawn cards.
${modID}:ParticleAccelerator.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Next turn, draw !M! cards and add ${modID}:Phase to all drawn cards.

${modID}:CometStrike.NAME: Comet Strike
${modID}:CometStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add an *Ion *Tail into your hand.
${modID}:CometStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add an *Ion *Tail+ into your hand.

${modID}:ResonantHexagraph.NAME: Resonant Hexagraph
${modID}:ResonantHexagraph.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block and, once per turn, add a copy to your hand with 2 less Block until it reaches 0.

${modID}:EclipsedForm.NAME: Eclipsed Form
${modID}:EclipsedForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, draw 1 card. Then, increase this gain and your maximum hand size by !M!.

${modID}:MagmaBurn.NAME: Magma Burn
${modID}:MagmaBurn.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, take !M! damage for every Status in your hand. When this card is Exhausted, add a *Burn to your discard pile.

${modID}:SulfurPod.NAME: Sulfur Pod
${modID}:SulfurPod.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL At the end of your turn, take !M! damage for every Status in your hand. When this card is Exhausted, add a *Burn to your discard pile.

${modID}:dummyethereal.NAME: Etheral Mod
${modID}:dummyethereal.DESCRIPTION: Adds Better Ethereal Mod to all cards in hand.

${modID}:SystemError.NAME: System Error
${modID}:SystemError.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! times a card ${modID}:Phases, draw 2 cards.
